alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:40PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern White, western Fulton, Pulaski, northwestern Cass, southern Starke and southwestern Marshall Counties through 1230 AM EDT/1130 PM CDT/... At 1139 PM EDT/1039 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Judson to near Monon. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winamac, Monon, North Judson, Culver, Francesville, Royal Center, Medaryville, Pulaski, Ripley, Kewanna, Monterey, Leiters Ford, Beardstown, Leases Corner, Denham, Hibbard, Clarks, Winona, Delong and Lake Bruce. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke; White
